de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.typehandler

Interface ITypeHandlerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTypeHandlerFactory, StringTypeHandlerFactory

    public interface ITypeHandlerFactory
    The ITypeHandlerFactory is used to create the convenient ITypeHandler for an implementation of IDataStore

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • getTypeHandler

                            java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation)
        Get the conventient ITypeHandler for the given Class
        Parameters:
        cls - the class
        annotation - an annotation of type Referenced or Embedded or NULL. ITypeHandler can react to this information
